existing_features.title: In the Header component, change the progress bar background color from 'bg-accent' to match the site's blue color used for other inputs
In the MessageInput component, remove the unnecessary border from the chat input textarea

In the Header component, update the Chattr logo to use a rounded-full background with bg-primary, containing a message-circle icon (24x24) with text-primary-foreground color. The logo container should be flex h-10 w-10 items-center justify-center rounded-full bg-primary

projectName: Fix chatroom page styling: progress bar color, chat input border, and header logo
